channel.title: [PI] Statius's Warhammer Special
channel.description: My statius warhammers special is glitched. I can just click the special bar and it consumes it without even attacking an enemy. How do I fix this?

item.title: [PI] Statius's Warhammer Special
item.dc:creator: @RegalX RegalX
item.description:
@RegalX wrote:

No errors, the special attack with the animation is fine. If I do the ::spec command and get 20 specials I can just spam the button and I’ll do it hundreds of times. and if I’m out of combat it just keeps using them. Whats weird is if I do the attack on players, it does the gmaul animation…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Statius's Warhammer Special
item.dc:creator: @M.I.A M.I.A.
item.description:
@M.I.A wrote:

I think that is something which would have to be fixed in the client itself, seeing that sources don’t hold Special attack GFX. Try another client? Also do you get any errors?

Read full topic
